comments.body: Woah. How long are we expecting getting a locale to take? Can't we build with no strings or something, and fill in the strings later? We don't want to be missing any frames in the initial rendering!

The initializeMessages function generated by the Dart Intl tools is async (probably because it might load a deferred library).  So config.onLocaleChanged had to be async as well.

In the framework, is there a good way to do initialization of things like the locale before starting the app?
